QuestData.Title: Mind the Gap
QuestData.Description: In all of the Blood Furnace, there is one area where our scryers cannot reach despite their efforts.$B$BThis 'gap', as they've been calling it, is fairly large, and must be where Magtheridon is being held captive..$B$BYou must find the source of the interference and dispose of it.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Something very powerful lies deep within this place.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Keli'dan the Breaker and return to Caza'rez.
QuestData.RewardText: The interference has gone down, but we still cannot access that area. We will continue to investigate the matter. Thank you for your help.
